ygData.subject: Re: Is Jewelcraft Broke?
ygData.msgSnippet: what level are you? all skills cannot go up past 5 times your level plus 5 (and in some cases, 3 times your level plus 3)... Qorona of the Volition Guild, 16th
ygData.messageBody:
what level are you? all skills cannot go up past 5 times your level plus 5
(and in some cases, 3 times your level plus 3)...

Qorona of the Volition Guild, 16th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 12:55 PM 5/3/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Miko, Jeff" <JMiko@...>
>
>I watched every attempt. It never showed a skill increase. Make more? I
>have no more money until I sell some Jade Rings for 8p each. I don't
>wont to waste the money though if I'm not going to get skill
>improvements. I already put 40p plus sell back money into it to get to
>37. Then I put another 70p without sell back money and got nothing.
>That's too weird. It's kind of disappointing. I don't know what to do.
>Maybe I need to level some more.
>
>Later
>
>A Bummed Enchanter
